name: Flesh & Bone
description:
Flesh & Bone is a proof-of-concept game project made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (theme: "Joined together").

Fuse bones together into weapons to overcome obstacles and escape the dungeon.

Controls

Arrow keys — movement

X — advance dialogue / attack

Space — gather bones

WASD — manipulate bones

Credits

Art & coding: @FeatureKreep

Music: Eric Matyas

Want to support me? You can donate to my Ko-fi ☕
